Content: Venerable Akmeemana Dayarathana Thera has been remanded until 9 th of October by the Mount Lavinia Magistrate. The Thera was arrested by the Colombo Crime Division this afternoon after he reported to the CCD to give a statement over the protest held in Mount Lavinia on 26 th of September. The other individual, 40-year-old Raveendra Warnajith Perera, who surrendered to the CCD was also remanded until 9 th of October. He was a resident of Nugegoda. Police said Perera will also be produced for an identification parade. Update: Monday, October 2, 2017, 16:10 ......................................................... Akmeemana Dayarathana Thera arrested Colombo Crime Division this afternoon arrested venerable Akmeemana Dayarathana Thera over the protest held in Mount Lavinia on 26 th of September. Here, a group held a protest nearby a house sheltering a 31-member Rohingya refugees. The Thera was asked to report to the Colombo Crime Division to record a statement over the incident. Another individual who surrendered to the CCD was also arrested. He was 40-year-old Raveendra Warnajith Perera, a resident of Nugegoda. They will be produced before the Mount Lavinia Magistrate’s Court.
